forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
